title: Litigation Support + Trial Prep
description: A workflow for building a clean case file: issues, evidence map, witness prep, and trial outline.
checklist: Create issue list and element-by-element proof chart
Build an evidence map (doc IDs, witnesses, dates, citations)
Draft trial themes and opening/closing outline
risk_notes: Be conservative with confidentiality: sanitize exhibits before using third-party tools.
Verify every quote and timeline fact against original evidence.
